name: fishing-rod
effect: Allows the player to fish for Pokémon.
short_effect: Allows the player to fish for Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A Fishing Rod made by Captain Lana. Cast a line
over piles of underwater rocks to fish for wild
aquatic Pokémon.
